title: This is F@cking Ridiculous
body: I decided to log on and play some ranked today and the first game I get into my game suddenly keeps crashing and forcing me to reconnect. I still attempted to reconnect and play every single time but as soon as I get back in 1-2 minutes later it crashes again. I had to eventually give up and not bother reconnecting so now my team has to play out a 4v5. I have never had this issue EVER in the 4 years I've played this game. I WANT MY FUCKING LP BACK RIOT WHAT THE HELL.
